item.title: 世贸组织称中美贸易可能减少多达 80
item.description: 世界贸易组织周三估计，中美贸易紧张局势可能会使两个经济体之间的货物贸易减少多达80%。【原文：The World Trade Organization on Wednesday estimated the U.S.- China trade tensions could cut the trade of goods between two economies by as much as 80%.】

item.title: 特朗普暂停加征关税后，交易员削减对美联储5月降息的押注
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Truth）在社交场合表示，他将进一步提高对中国的关税，但上周宣布的对其他大多数国家大幅提高关税的措施将暂停90天，交易员们周三大幅削减了此前对美联储5月开始降息的押注。【原文：Traders on Wednesday sharply trimmed their earlier bets on a May start to Federal Reserve rate cuts after U.S. President Donald Trump said on Truth Social he was further increasing tariffs on China but pausing for 90 days the big tariff increases he had announced last week for most other countries.】

item.title: 意法半导体独立董事会成员阻止意大利萨拉公司的任命
item.description: 意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics）监事会主席周三表示，该公司监事会的三名独立成员阻止了意大利人马尔切洛-萨拉（Marcello Sala）进入这家法意芯片制造商董事会的任命，否决了法国成员的支持。【原文：Three independent members of STMicroelectronics' supervisory board blocked the appointment of Italian Marcello Sala to the Franco-Italian chipmaker's board, vetoing support from French members, its chairman said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国国债拍卖缓解了市场对抛售的担忧
item.description: 作为全球金融体系的基石，美国国债周三早些时候遭遇新的抛售压力，这表明在美国推出全面贸易关税引发市场动荡后，投资者正在抛售最安全的资产。【原文：U.S. Treasuries, the bedrock of the global financial system, were hit by fresh selling pressure earlier Wednesday, in a sign that investors were dumping their safest assets after the U.S. roiled markets by introducing sweeping trade tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布暂停征收关税 90 天
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，作为其关税计划的一部分，他授权暂停90天，但同时将对中国的关税税率提高至125%，立即生效。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he authorized a 90-day pause as part of his tariff plan but was also raising the tariff rate for China to 125%, effective immediately.】

item.title: NRF 预测：受特朗普关税影响，2025 年下半年美国进口将下降 20
item.description: 美国全国零售联合会（National Retail Federation）周三的预测显示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对几个贸易伙伴全面征收关税，2025年下半年美国进口可能同比下降至少20%。【原文：Imports into the U.S. could be down at least 20% year-over-year in the second half of 2025 due to U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs on several trade partners, a forecast by the National Retail Federation showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 社区组织称，马斯克的 xAI 未经许可增加了田纳西州的燃气轮机
item.description: 据社区团体致田纳西州卫生部门的一封信称，埃隆-马斯克的 xAI 公司在田纳西州数据中心安装的燃气轮机增加了近一倍，超过了之前已知的数字，也超过了该公司已提交许可证的数量。【原文：Elon Musk's xAI has nearly doubled gas turbines at its Tennessee data center, exceeding previously known figures and surpassing the number for which the company has submitted permits, according to a letter from community groups to the county's health department.】

item.title: 智利认为特朗普对铜征收关税将带来积极影响
item.description: 智利矿业部长奥罗拉-威廉姆斯（Aurora Williams）周三表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）决定对铜征收关税，智利在美国上周宣布的关税中处于低端位置，这可能对这个世界主要产铜国有利。【原文：Chile's place at the low-end of U.S. tariffs announced last week could be favorable for the world's leading copper-producing country if U.S. President Donald Trump decides to slap tariffs on copper, Chile Mining Minister Aurora Williams said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Alphabet 首席执行官重申 2025 年 750 亿美元资本支出计划
item.description: Alphabet 首席执行官桑达尔-皮查伊（Sundar Pichai）周三重申，谷歌母公司计划在 2025 年斥资 750 亿美元购买服务器和数据中心。【原文：Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai on Wednesday reaffirmed the Google parent company's plans to spend $75 billion in 2025 on servers and data centers.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，意大利在逃税调查中向金融科技集团 ION 索要 13 亿美元
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，意大利北部城市博洛尼亚的检察官对金融科技集团 ION 在 2013-2023 年期间涉嫌逃税一事进行调查后，意大利正在向该集团追讨 12 亿欧元（13 亿美元）。【原文：Italy is seeking 1.2 billion euros ($1.3 billion) from fintech group ION following a probe by prosecutors in the northern city of Bologna into alleged tax evasion over the 2013-2023 period, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 据美国全国公共广播电台（NPR）报道，特朗普政府在马阿拉歌晚宴后放弃了对 Nvidia H20 芯片的打击
item.description: 据美国全国公共广播电台（NPR）周三援引两位知情人士的话报道，在首席执行官黄仁勋上周出席了玛拉歌（Mar-a-Lago）晚宴之后，白宫改变了遏制英伟达（Nvidia）H20 芯片的方针。【原文：The White House has reversed course on curbs on Nvidia's H20 chips after CEO Jensen Huang attended a Mar-a-Lago dinner last week, NPR reported on Wednesday, citing two sources with knowledge of the plan.】

item.title: 美国议员采取行动阻止国际货币基金组织（IMF）因石油基金争端对中非提供支持
item.description: 美国立法者提出了一项立法，可能会阻止国际货币基金组织（IMF）对一些中非国家的支持，以保护石油公司必须留出用于环境恢复的数十亿美元。【原文：U.S. lawmakers have introduced legislation that could block International Monetary Fund (IMF) support for some Central African countries, in an effort to guard billions of dollars that oil companies must set aside for environmental restoration.】

item.title: 英国 JD Sports 支持耐克战略，称双方关系良好
item.description: 英国体育用品零售商 JD Sports 是耐克最大的客户之一，该公司周三表示，尽管面临贸易和关税方面的挑战，但该公司对耐克品牌的发展方向和双方的关系感觉 "非常好"。【原文：British sportswear retailer JD Sports , one of Nike's largest customers, said on Wednesday it felt "really good" about the direction of the brand and their relationship despite trading and tariff challenges.】

item.title: 巴斯夫起诉伯克希尔的金霸王公司，指控其窃取电池机密
item.description: 法庭文件显示，沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）旗下的电池制造商金霸王公司（Duracell）被巴斯夫公司（BASF）起诉，指控其窃取了这家德国化学公司的锂离子电池技术相关商业机密。【原文：Duracell, the battery maker owned by Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway , has been sued by BASF for allegedly stealing trade secrets related to the German chemical company's lithium ion battery technology, court documents showed.】

item.title: 美国企业债券市场再次因特朗普关税波动而关闭
item.description: 美国企业债券市场在周二仅开盘发售了一只债券后再次关闭，因为在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布解放日关税后的一周内，利差扩大幅度达到了自2023年地区银行业危机以来的最大值。【原文：The U.S. corporate bond market has shut again after opening for just one bond offering on Tuesday, as spreads in the week after President Donald Trump's Liberation Day tariffs have widened the most since 2023's regional banking crisis.】

item.title: 美国炼油厂不太可能斥巨资加工更多国内石油
item.description: 行业消息人士和分析师表示，美国炼油厂不打算进行大笔投资，以加工更多的国内原油，减少来自主要供应国加拿大和墨西哥的石油，这是特朗普总统提高石油产量计划的一个障碍。【原文：U.S. refiners are not planning to make big-ticket investments to process more domestic crude and less oil from top suppliers Canada and Mexico, industry sources and analysts said, an obstacle to President Trump's plan to boost oil output.】

item.title: 长江和记在巴拿马投资 17 亿美元，超额完成任务
item.description: 总部位于香港的长江和记控制的一家公司周三表示，已在巴拿马运河附近的两个港口投资 17 亿美元，超过了合同规定的金额，巴拿马当局正在对该合同进行审计。【原文：A company controlled by Hong Kong-based CK Hutchison has invested $1.7 billion in two ports near the Panama Canal, it said on Wednesday, surpassing the amount required under its contract, which is being audited by Panamanian authorities.】

item.title: 空中客车公司三月份交付 71 架喷气式飞机
item.description: 空中客车公司周三证实，3月份交付了71架喷气式飞机，使第一季度的交付量从去年同期的142架下降到136架。【原文：Airbus delivered 71 jets in March, the planemaker confirmed on Wednesday, bringing first-quarter deliveries to 136, down from 142 a year earlier.】

item.title: 哈斯 F1 车队称关税不会影响车队所有者的业务
item.description: 美国哈斯一级方程式车队表示，尽管老板吉恩-哈斯（Gene Haas）的机床业务因唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的贸易关税而出现 "需求大幅下降"，但车队仍在正常运营。【原文：The U.S.-owned Haas Formula One team said they were carrying on as normal despite owner Gene Haas's machine tools business reporting a 'dramatic decrease in demand' as a result of President Donald Trump's trade tariffs.】

item.title: 乌克兰铁路迄今已恢复一半受网络攻击影响的 IT 服务
item.description: 乌克兰最大的货运公司--乌克兰国家铁路公司（Ukrzaliznytsia）周三表示，在 3 月底遭受的大规模网络攻击中，该公司仅成功恢复了约一半的 IT 服务。【原文：Ukrainian state railways Ukrzaliznytsia, the country's largest cargo carrier, said on Wednesday that it had managed to restore only about half of its IT services hit by a large-scale cyber attack in late March.】

item.title: 独家报道美联储穆萨莱姆认为经济增长低于趋势，通胀风险加大
item.description: 圣路易斯联储主席阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，随着企业和家庭适应新进口关税导致的价格上涨，美国经济增长可能会 "实质性地 "低于趋势，失业率将在年内上升。【原文：U.S. economic growth will likely slip "materially" below trend and the unemployment rate will rise over the year as firms and households adjust to prices driven higher by new import tariffs, St. Louis Fed President Alberto Musalem said.】

item.title: 消息人士称特朗普有望签署美国造船业行政令
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计可能在周三签署一项行政命令，旨在重振美国造船业，削弱中国对全球航运业的控制。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to sign an executive order potentially on Wednesday aimed at reinvigorating U.S. shipbuilding and reducing China's grip on the global shipping industry, three sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: EIA 数据显示，美国原油库存增加，出口量创 1 月份新低
item.description: 美国能源信息署周三称，上周美国原油库存增加，原因是进口增加，出口降至1月份以来的最低点，同时汽油和馏分油库存减少。【原文：U.S. crude oil stockpiles rose last week as imports increased and exports fell to their lowest since January, while gasoline and distillate inventories drew down, the Energy Information Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 从果汁到珠宝：欧盟将对哪些美国商品征收关税？
item.description: 欧盟将从下周二开始对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收钢铝关税采取反制措施，对210亿欧元（约合230亿美元）的美国进口商品征收额外关税。【原文：The European Union will launch countermeasures from next Tuesday against U.S. President Donald Trump’s steel and aluminium tariffs with extra duties on 21 billion euros ($23 billion) of U.S. imports.】

item.title: Lightmatter 展示可减少人工智能能耗的新型计算机芯片
item.description: 硅谷初创公司 Lightmatter 周三透露，它已开发出一种新型计算机芯片，既能加快人工智能工作的速度，又能在此过程中减少用电量。【原文：Silicon Valley startup Lightmatter revealed on Wednesday it had developed a new type of computer chip that could both speed up artificial intelligence work and use less electricity in the process.】

item.title: 关税引发的股市暴跌余震中的企业信贷震荡
item.description: 关税冲击和经济衰退的担忧在上周使全球股市陷入低迷，这种担忧正在蔓延到企业融资市场，提高了借贷成本，甚至扰乱了低风险公司的融资计划。【原文：The tariff shock and recession fears that have sent world stocks into a tailspin over the last week are rolling into corporate funding markets, raising the cost of borrowing and disrupting financing plans even for lower-risk companies.】

item.title: Canalys 称关税焦虑推动第一季度个人电脑出货量增长
item.description: 研究公司Canalys周三表示，今年第一季度全球个人电脑出货量增长了9.4%，原因是个人电脑制造商因预期美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将全面征收关税而增加了对美国的发货量。【原文：Global shipments of personal computers rose 9.4% in the first quarter of this year as PC makers boosted consignments to the United States in anticipation of President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, research firm Canalys said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国法案设立基金对俄罗斯幽灵舰队实施石油制裁
item.description: 来自美国两党的两位参议员于周三提出了一项立法，建立一个基金，以对俄罗斯为逃避西方对其乌克兰战争的制裁而依赖的所谓 "幽灵 "油轮船队实施制裁。【原文：Legislation from two U.S. senators from both parties introduced on Wednesday establishes a fund to enforce sanctions on the so-called ghost fleet of tankers Russia relies on to carry oil to avoid Western sanctions over its war on Ukraine.】

item.title: 欧盟关税将抑制美国玉米进口，大豆风险暂时较低
item.description: 贸易商和行业代表表示，欧盟从下周开始对美国商品征收反关税，这将阻止大量美国玉米流向欧洲，并提高寻求替代饲料谷物供应的买家的成本。【原文：European Union counter-tariffs on U.S. goods starting next week are set to halt a large flow of U.S. corn to Europe and raise costs for buyers chasing alternative supplies of the feed grain, traders and industry representatives said.】

item.title: 瑞士总统与特朗普谈贸易，希望尽快解决问题
item.description: 瑞士总统卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）周三表示，她已就贸易问题与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普通了电话，并期待在瑞士被征收比欧盟邻国更高的进口关税后达成协议。【原文：Swiss President Karin Keller-Sutter said on Wednesday she had spoken to U.S. President Donald Trump by telephone about trade and was looking forward to reaching agreements after Switzerland was hit with bigger import tariffs than its EU neighbours.】
